text: Michael John Pollard (born Michael John Pollack Jr.; May 30, 1939 - November 20, 2019) was an American character actor. He was best known for playing C.W. Moss in the 1967 movie Bonnie and Clyde. The role earned him an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor nomination. Pollard died of cardiac arrest on November 20, 2019 in Los Angeles, California at the age of 80. == Personal life == Pollard was married to actress Beth Howland, In 2010, Pollard stated that he was Bisexual. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:People from Passaic, New Jersey Category:Bisexual people
